title: Another classic that all must see.
review: This movie works an all levels.  The story, characters, dialogue, editing and scoring mesh together very well and, at the hands of a good director, they don't overpower each other, but rather work together to give us an enjoyable viewing experience.

movie_title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
title: A classic that everyone should see.
review: I really like this movie.  I've seen it three times and each time I discover something new.  Its theme certainly resonates in any time period.  The whole cast, and particularly Jack Nicholson, deliver fine performances.  It's a classic and a must see.
